head.title: GLOBO IN DEAL WITH TELECOM ITALIA

hedline.hl1: GLOBO IN DEAL WITH TELECOM ITALIA

abstract.p: Brazil's Organizacoes Globo sells 30 percent stake in Web portal Globo.com to Telecom Italia for $810 million (S)

block.p: In another partnership of telecommunications and Internet companies in Latin America, Brazil's largest media company, Organizacoes Globo, sold a 30 percent stake in the Web portal Globo.com to Telecom Italia for $810 million. Globo plans to use the capital to expand in Latin America and to develop wireless Internet capabilities. Globo said the Web site, which started at the end of March, had an average of 700,000 visitors a day in April. The company plans to issue shares of Globo.com on the Nasdaq.
